items.title: Stocks to Watch: Adani Green, Vedanta, Ireda, Sterlite Tech, NMDC, TaMo
items.description: Vedanta has approved a third interim dividend of Rs 20 per share for FY25, raising the total dividend payout so far to Rs 13,474 crore.

items.title: Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi suggests buying these three stocks today
items.description: Recently, Allcargo Logistics has formed a bullish Bat pattern, which is a harmonic chart pattern known for indicating potential reversals.

items.title: Nifty Financial Services shows bullish trend in near-term; details here
items.description: For near-term traders, the optimal strategy is to book profits at current levels, given the proximity to resistance.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Subdued GIFT Nifty, mixed Asian markets signal slow start for India
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian markets are likely to open on a subdued note as indicated by the GIFT Nifty futures that were trading marginally ahead of Nifty futures' last close.

items.title: Stock market today: Sensex, Nifty at record; Premier Energies IPO listing
items.description: Share Market Today, Tuesday, September 3, 2024: Baazar Style IPO, Premiere Energies IPO, economic data across countries to be on investors' radar today
